mapper.select: select * from notice_board where is_inactive = false order by reply_ref DESC, reply_ord ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice_board VALUES(default, '${writer}', null, '${title}', #{createDate}, null, 0, '${content}', false, (select IFNULL(max(notice_board_no), 0) + 1 FROM notice_board AS temp), 0, 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE notice_board SET reply_ord = reply_ord + 1 WHERE reply_ref = #{originRef} AND reply_ord > 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice_board VALUES (default, #{postTitle.writer}, null, #{postTitle.title}, #{postTitle.createDate}, null, 0, #{postTitle.content}, false, #{postTitle.replyRef}, (SELECT reply_ord FROM notice_board AS temp WHERE notice_board_no = #{postTitle.replyRef})+1, (SELECT reply_depth FROM notice_board AS temp WHERE notice_board_no = #{parentNo}) +1)
mapper.update: UPDATE notice_board set corrector = #{corrector}, title = #{title}, content = #{contents}, correct_date = now() WHERE notice_board_no = ${id}
mapper.delete: UPDATE notice_board set is_inactive = true WHERE notice_board_no = ${id}
